Angaza | Mobile, Frontend, Backend | San Francisco ONSITE

Angaza makes it possible for a billion people to access electricity for the first time, using solar power, for less money than they spend today. We develop technology that enables end-user financing for a range of energy products in emerging markets like Africa and India.

Join our six-person engineering team, and your daily impact at Angaza will be genuine and immediate: write better software during the day, and more families will have electricity for the first time that night.
